docTitle.titlePart:
Diode Laser Spectrum of HCCCN near 5 tun *
The Hot Band

byline.affiliation: I. Physikalisches Institut, Universität zu Köln

front.div:
Two hot bands associated with the vs vibration-rotation band of cyanoaoetylene, HC3N,
have been measured with a diode laser spectrometer in the 2060—2100 cm-1 range. Since the
width of the observed lines is essentially determined by Doppler broadening, the splitting of the
hot band rovibrational transitions due to /-type doubling could be resolved and was assigned.
Improved spectral parameters were obtained, including the anharmonicity parameters.
